Column Description: Transaction Date - Date on which a COM transaction is made
Demand Traffic - Current year COM Traffic for <customer>'s & BLM , based on unique session id's. No traffic for Big Ticket/Furniture gallery stores.
Demand Traffic for Previous Year - Previous year COM Traffic for <customer>'s & BLM , based on unique session id's. No traffic for Big Ticket/Furniture gallery stores.

Demand Transaction - Current year COM Transactions for <customer>'s & BLM , based on unique reservation numbers. This contains Small ticket and big ticket transactions. ESEND transactions are excluded from COM transactions.

Demand Transaction for Previous Year - Previous year COM Transactions for <customer>'s & BLM , based on unique reservation numbers. This contains Small ticket and big ticket transactions. ESEND transactions are excluded from COM transactions.

Demand Traffic Plans for Owned, Leased and Marketplace - Plan for COM traffic. 
<customer>'s plans daily COM traffic.
Bloomingdale's COM traffic plans equals  its equivalent  forecasted amount.

Demand Transaction Plans for Owned, Leased and Marketplace - Plan  for COM transaction.This is inclusive of Big Ticket.
<customer>'s plans COM transactions daily.
Bloomingdale's COM transactions plans equals its equivalent forecasted amount.

Demand Transaction Plan for Big Ticket - Plan for COM Big ticket (BT) transactions .
<customer>'s plans COM Big ticket transactions  daily.
Bloomingdale's do not plan COM Big ticket transactions.
Demand Traffic Forecast for Owned, Leased and Marketplace - Forecast for COM traffic.
Demand Transaction Forecast for Owned, Leased and Marketplace - Forecast forCOM transaction.This is inclusive of Big Ticket.

Demand Transaction Forecast for Big Ticket - Forecast for COM Big ticket (BT)
MCY forecast  COM transaction for Big Ticket
BLM do not have  COM transaction forecast for Big ticket.
Division Number - Operating division number

A dimension of STT, Register number, and LOC_DIM_ID : A dimension assigned to provide part of a unique key, used to later join various detailed sales tables. The STT_REG_LOC_DIM_ID represents the ringing/ Fulfillment  location for a dot com sale, and represents the physical location for a store ('bricks') sale transaction..The intersection where product on the salescheck was fulfilled - 1) STT-Store Terminal Transaction ID. Store transaction has a DSTT number  2) For .com transaction, a DSTT(Date Store Terminal Transaction ID) gets assigned randomly by the system  to identify the transaction.
Gregorian Date : The date the transaction was billed to the customer.The format for date selection is 'yyyy-mm-dd'.

Register Number : A number assigned either to a point-of-sale (POS) physical terminal id on the selling floor, or to a Back Office reserved id, to indicate where this transaction originated in this division, location, register number, and day.Register numbers may be duplicated between locations and divisions.

Transaction Number : A unique number assigned to this transaction from this POS or back office reserved id, on this day in this division, location, register number , transaction number, and day . Transaction number is a unique system generated random number that is created for each transaction(transaction  example:Return/Cancel/Book/Ship)

Product Dimension Identification number : The PROD_DIM_ID is an 18 digit number created from the timestamp when the PROD_DIM row was created; it uniquely identifies each product in each division of the company. Multiple SKU_UPC_NBR's can and do exist for a single Dept/Vendor/Mkst/Color/Size. Therefore, PROD_DIM_ID must be added to ensure that duplicates will not occur.
Division Number : The operating division / company for this transaction.

Store number where transaction happens or the sales was rung : (1) For <customer>'s most online transactions go to ringing location 222 ,  but Market Place goes to ringing location 130 (2) For Bloomingdales, most online transaction go to ringing location 93, but Market Place goes to ringing location 130  (3) For RDS (big ticket) transactions processed on line go directly to location 129 in both operating divisions.

Central ring store number : The central ring location number; this indicates what location gets the sale/return credit. If this column is zero, the sales credit goes to the store number in the STT_ZL_STORE_NBR field.  (1) For <customer>'s most online transactions credit goes to 129 ,  but Market Place goes to ringing location 130  (2) For Bloomingdales, most transactions credit goes to 129 , but Market Place goes to ringing location 130  (3) For RDS (big ticket) transactions processed on line go directly to location 129 in both operating divisions.

A dimension of STT and LOC_DIM_ID : A dimension assigned to provide part of a unique key, used to later join various detailed sales tables. The STT_LOC_DIM_ID represents the Central Ring location for a dot com sale, and represents the physical location for a store ('bricks') sale transaction.  (1) The location dimension for MCOM is 930 vs BCOM location is 977  (2) The location dimension for <customer>'s Marketplace is11142  vs Bloomingdales Marketplace is11144
Location Dimension Identifier : A dimension assigned to provide location dimension id.
Division Number : The operating division / company for this transaction.
Legacy Store Number : The 'ZL' fields were used for user facing screens and reports
Legacy Central ring store number : The 'ZL' fields were used for user facing screens and reports
Department Number where a product belongs : The department number for this UPC at the time of the sale transaction.
Sales Merchandise Amount : The extended (quantity x price) line item sold amount before point-of-sale discounts are applied, except for dotcom / RDS items that are net.
Sales Merchandise Discount : The amount of point-of-sale discounts applied to this item on this transaction on this day  at this location.
Sales Associate Discount : The amount of colleague / associate discounts applied to this item in the Back Office
Sales Back Office Markdown Loyalty Discount : The amount of Back Office Markdown Loyalty Discounts as calculated by the back office systems, in dollars and cents, for this transaction.

Sales Special Back Office Markdown Loyalty Discount : The amount of Special Back Office Markdown Loyalty Discounts as calculated by the back office systems, in dollars and cents, for this transaction.
Sales Adjustments : The dollar amount of sales adjustments for this transaction.
Sales Units : Units that are sold for each product on this transaction
Return Merchandise Amount : The extended (quantity x price) line item returned amount before point-of-sale discounts are applied, except for dotcom /RDS items that are net
Return Merchandise Discount : The original line item discount amount being reversed.
Return Associate Discount : The amount of colleague / associate discounts applied to this returned item in the Back Office tied to an original sale

Return Back Office Markdown Loyalty Discount : Calculated by the back office systems, in dollars and cents, for thistransaction tied to an original sale. New charge accounts are a source of this discount.
Return Special Back Office Markdown Loyalty Discount : The return adjustment dollars tied to an original sale.
Return Adjustment : The return adjustment dollars tied to an original sale.
Return Units : The returned units tied to the original sale
Item Last Cost : The item's most recent cost. Represented in dollars/cents.
Last Update number : The last date / time a row was updated.The value is zero unless the row was updated.

Register ID : A value applied to a sales transaction to indicate it's origin. 
Common values include:
 FF = FedFIL transactions will no longer use this code if processed through the central server.
AL=Aloha Restaurant
FB=Back Office Markdown
RD=RDS Transactions
ZM=Zoom Kiosks
SP=SmartPOS
FA=Full Screen
LY=My <customer>s Loyalty Rewards Markdowns
FP= Pre-Sell
MR=Micros Restaurant
BR=Bridal Automated Markdowns
Omni Channel Dimension Code : A number initially assigned to each item sold to identify how the customer purchased merchandise and how the merchandise was fulfilled.
Congruency Value
Price Location Number : The division or the pricing region assigned to this row.
Ticket Retail/Current ticket price : Value of Merchandise that <customer>'s Inc. currently sells a product. It is the price that a customer will pay for a product at the door when it is not on sale.
Owned Retail : Value of Merchandise that <customer>'s Inc. currently own a product from accounting perspective.
Price Status : The markdown status from the Item or Basic Record.
Fulfillment Price Location Number : The division or the pricing region assigned to this row.
Attribute Abbreviation for selling location : The abbreviation of the attribute type description of the attribute type number.
Attribute Abbreviation for Fulfillment location : The abbreviation of the attribute type description of the attribute type number.
Replenishment Flag : A lookup flag that indicates if a product needs to be stocked up/reordered by location during any transaction event.
Replenishment Replacement SKU Flag
FIL Replenishment Flag
FIL Replenishment Replacement SKU Flag
FIL Replenishment Flag Source

Average Weighted Cost : Average Weighted Cost is the style level cost tracked over time, which updates as the cost increases/decreases due to negotiated discounts or price increases AWC cannot be reduced with Markdown.

First Ticket Retail : Value of the Merchandise that <customer>'s Inc. initially decides to sell a product. It is the manufacturer suggested retail price at which the product is first introduced in the market for selling.
Penny Indicator : A code that indicates a liquidation (penny) status of products based on the product retail value. Penny merchandise are products that are valued at 2 cents or less.
Penny Flag : A lookup flag that indicates if a product is valued at a penny or not.
Gross Sales Amount : Sales merchandise amount, sales discounts and adjustments, in dollars / cents for this level of transaction. Returns are not used in this calculation
Gross Returns Amount : Return merchandise amount,  return discounts and adjustments, in dollars / cents for this level of transaction. Sales are not used in this calculation
Net Sales Amount at Transaction Level : The net of Gross Sales and Gross Returns in dollars.
Net Sales Units at Transaction Level : The net of Gross Sales and Gross Returns in units
Sales Loyalty Discount : The combined Sale Loyalty Back Office Markdowns and Sale Special Back Office Markdowns.
Return Loyalty Discount : The combined Return Loyalty Back Office Markdowns and Return Special Back Office Markdowns, representing the total loyalty discounts returned
First Ticket Net Sales Amount : The initial retail price for all net quantity of units sold during this transaction, on this specific day, at this location, for this particular product.
Net Sales Cost Amount : Cost associated with net quantity of units sold during this transaction, on this specific day, at this location, for this particular product.
Total Discount Amount : Discount amount for merchandise sold on a given transaction day for a given time frame.

Plan Type
Description whether the plan is owned , leased marketplace or total example: own = 1, lease = 5, 6 = total . For Blumercury hardcoded to 1 =OWN
Plan Net Sales
Operating Division Number-The operating division / company for this transaction. The division values are 12 (<customer>'s) & 13 (Bloomingdales)
Gregorian Date -The date the transaction was recorded as a non-financial pre-sale to the customer or as a Pre-Sale Cancel.
Department Number-The department number for this UPC at the time of the sale transaction. It denotes the presell department numbers for both small ticket and big ticket.
Location Dimension Identification number-The unique ID number assigned to the location
Class Number-The class within a department assigned to this product dimension
Store Number- The store number for this row indicating where the sales was rung.

Presell Initial -Refers to a transaction in which a customer makes a purchase for a future date. It is the stage before any cancellations occur. Pre-orders have not been processed financially yet, and this applies to sales specific to a store. The value can be expressed in both units and dollars. This is after the Point of Sale Discounts, Perms, and Coupon discounts and prior to back office  and colleague discounts.

Presell Net (WRTSUM)-This value represents both the small ticket and big ticket presell Net .
Presell Net refers to any transaction where a customer makes a purchase for a future date. It is the stage after all cancellations are removed.  Cancellations occur on the day of the cancellations.Pre-orders have not been financially processed yet, and this applies to store specific sales. The value can be expressed in both units and dollars.

Presell Cancel Amount-This value represents the presale cancel amount for the small ticket transactions. This column is a place holder column and  not used for calculating the Presell Net(WRTSUM). Not populating big ticket cancel amount
Gregorian Date - Date on which the transaction was made.
Division Number - Operating division number:

Gross Sales Amount - Total Store gross sales prior to returns for current year. This includes the loyalty markdowns and all discounts. Includes only selling store locations in operating divisions(MCY & MBKS combined) and (BLM &BOS Combined). This is true gross sales for current year.It is for Owned,Leased & Marketplace

Store Fleet Traffic - Total Store fleet Traffic for the current year for all selling locations. This represents the number of footsteps in a store for current year
For MCY Stores-It represents grossed-up/extrapolated  fleet Traffic for the current year. It is calculated by extrapolating store traffic for all selling locations based on 2025 traffic comp logic. This extrapolation aims to project the total traffic for the entire fleet, even if traffic data is only available for a subset of locations.

For BLM Stores- this represents the actual total store fleet traffic for the current year. The data is sourced directly from RetailNext, as all Bloomingdale's stores have cameras that generate traffic data.

Net Positive Sale Transaction for stores - Number of purchase transactions for current year where unit quantity is greater than zero. This includes transactions with net_sls_amt>.02, and excludes audit adjustment transactions, Gift with Purchase (GWP) and restaurants .This is true store transaction for all selling locations in the current year.
Gross Sales Units  - Numbersof units sold for current year.Units with sales values >0 for current year,Includes only selling store locations.Excludes GWP & penny units

Gross Sales Amount for Previous Year - Total Store gross sales prior to returns for previous year. This includes the loyalty markdowns and all discounts. Includes only selling store locations in operating divisions(MCY & MBKS combined) and (BLM &BOS Combined). This is true gross sales for previous year.It is for Owned,Leased & Marketplace

Store Fleet Traffic for Previous Year - Total Store fleet Traffic for the previous year for all selling locations. This represents the number of footsteps in a store for previous year
For MCY Stores-It represents grossed-up/extrapolated  fleet Traffic for the previous year. It is calculated by extrapolating store traffic for all selling locations based on 2025 traffic comp logic. This extrapolation aims to project the total traffic for the entire fleet, even if data is only available for a subset of locations.

For BLM Stores- this represents the actual total store fleet traffic for the previous year. The data is sourced directly from RetailNext, as all Bloomingdale's stores have cameras that generate traffic data.

Net Positive Sale Transaction for stores for Previous Year - Number of purchase transactions forprevious year where unit quantity is greater than zero. This includes transactions with net_sls_amt>.02, and excludes audit adjustment transactions,Gift with Purchase (GWP) and restaurants.This is true store transaction for all selling locations in the previous year.
Gross Sale units for Previous Year - Numbers of units sold for previous year.Units with sales values >0 for current year,Includes only selling store locations.Excludes GWP & penny units
Gross Sales Plan Amount - Plan Amount for Gross Sales. Gross Sales plans exist for MCYs.There are no gross sales plan amount for BLM.

Traffic Plan - Plan for the Traffic. Store Traffic plans exist for MCYs.
 There are no store traffic plans for BLM.

Number of Units Plan - Plan for units sold .Store unit plans exist for MCYs.
There are no store unit plans for BLM.
Transaction Plan - Plan for Transactions. Store transaction plans exist for MCYs..There are no store transaction plans for BLM.
Gross Sales Forecast Amount  - Forecast Amount for Gross Sales.Store gross sales forecast exist for MCYs.There are no store gross sales forecast for BLM.
Traffic Forecast - Forecast for Traffic.Store traffic forecast exist for MCYs.There are no store traffic forecast for BLM.

Number of  Units Forecast - Forecast for units sold . Store unit forecast exist for MCYs.
There are no store units forecast for BLM.

Transaction Forecast - Forecast for Transaction.Store transaction forecast exist for MCYs.
There are no store transaction forecast for BLM.

Division Number-Operating Division Number
MCY = 12 / 72; BLM = 13 / 72
Small Ticket Reservation Number-Reservation Number for small ticket orders
Big Ticket Reservation Number-RDS Reservation Number for big ticket orders
Big Ticket Shipment Number-RDS Shipment Number for big ticket orders, which currently does not exist and will be null.
Small Ticket Shipment Number-Shipment Number for small ticket orders
Sales Product Dimension ID-Product identifier for the products included in the transaction
Sales Location Dimension ID-Location identifier for the location where the sales transaction originated
Fill Location Dimension ID'-Location identifier for the location where the products in a transaction were fulfilled from
Date of Demand Initially Placed-Date on which an order was first created
Order cancel date-Date on which an order was cancelled
Shipped date-Date on which an item in an order was shipped
Application ID-Identifies the originating source of launched application

Penny Unit Indicator-A code that indicates a liquidation (penny) status of products. Penny merchandise are products that are valued at 2 cents or less. 
For small ticket, 0-8 = penny unit, 9 = everything else.  
For big ticket, 2 = penny unit, 9  everything else.

Penny Flag-A lookup flag that indicates if a product is valued at a penny or not.  Use this column to remove penny units from the corresponding unit columns. 
For small ticket, when penny_ind is either 0, 1, 2, 8 then penny_flg is 'Y' and 9 is 'N'.
For big ticket, when penny_ind = 2 then penny_flg is 'Y' ELSE 'N'.

Initial Demand Amount-Initial Demand Amount for all customer orders which are checked out in website prior remorse / fraud check window.  
For big ticket, this will be same as Demand Amount.

Initial Demand Units-Initial Demand Amount for all customer orders which are checked out in website prior remorse / fraud check window.  
For big ticket, this will be same as Demand Amount.

Demand Units-Demand Units of COM Orders made by customers after remorse / fraud check window. ESEND is not part of COM orders and should be excluded here. Use appl_id to exclude ESEND for respective Divisions.

Demand Amount-Demand Amount of COM Orders made by customers after remorse/fraud check window. ESEND is not part of COM orders and should be excluded here. Use appl_id to exclude ESEND for respective Divisions.
Total Cancellation Amount-Demand Amount that has been cancelled
Total Cancellation Units-Demand Units that have been cancelled
Shipped Amount-Demand Amount that has been fulfilled or shipped
Shipped Units-Demand Units that have been fulfilled or shipped
Confirmed Sales Amount-Demand Amount excluding Total Cancellation Amount
Confirmed Sales Units-Demand Units excluding Total Cancellation Units
Demand Open to Ship Amt-Demand Amount that is yet to be shipped
Demand Open to Ship Units-Demand Units that are yet to be shipped
Department Number-Department Number assigned to the product

Demand  Plan Amount for Owned, Leased, Marketplace - Total Demand plan amount (Owned, Leased and Marketplace) with Big Ticket.
Bloomingdales  daily demand plans and  demand forecast are same at OLM level.Demand plans are only available for OL level.

Demand  Plan Amount for Owned, and Leased - Demand plan amount (Owned & Leased) with Big Ticket (BT) .
<customer>'s plan value excludes Marketplace. 
Bloomingdales plan value excludes Marketplace, and  BT .However, it is inclusive of BOPS .
Demand  Plan Amount for Marketplace - Demand plan amount for  Marketplace  without Big Ticket.It exists for <customer>'s but Bloomingdales do not plan Demand  for Marketplace.

Demand   Plan Amount for Big Ticket - Demand plan amount for big ticket by location by day.
Exists only for Mcy's.Bloomingdales do not plan Big Ticket Demand seperately.

Demand Plan Units - Total Demand plan units  (Owned, Leased and Marketplace) with Big Ticket.
Bloomingdales do not plan Demand Unit.

Demand Forecast Amount for Owned and Leased Marketplace - Total Demand forecast amount (Owned, Leased and Marketplace) with Big Ticket.
Bloomingdales  daily demand plans and  demand forecast are same at OLM level.BLM Demand forecast are only available for OL level.

Demand Forecast Amount for Owned and Leased - Demand forecast amount (Owned & Leased)  with Big Ticket .Forecast value excludes Marketplace. 
Bloomingdales do not have forecast Demand at OL Level.

Demand Forecast Amount for Marketplace - Demand forecast amount for <customer>'s Marketplace without Big Ticket.
Bloomingdales do not forecast Demand  at Marketplace.

Demand Forecast Amount for Big Ticket - Demand forecast amount for big ticket by location by day.
Exists ONLY for <customer>'s.
Bloomingdales do not forecast Big Ticket demand seperately.

Demand Forecast Units - Total Forecast plan units  (Owned, Leased and Marketplace) with Big Ticket.
Bloomingdales do not forecast Demand Unit.

Confirmed Sales Planned Amount for Owned and Leased Marketplace - Total Confirmed Sales plan amount (Owned, Leased and Marketplace) with Big Ticket.Not available for Bloomigdales.
BLM do not plan Confirmed Sales

Confirmed Sales Planned  Amount for Owned and Leased - Confirmed Sales plan amount (Owned & Leased) for <customer>'s with Big Ticket .Plan value excludes Marketplace
BLM do not plan Confirmed Sales

Confirmed Sales Planned Amount for Marketplace - Confirmed Sales plan amount for <customer>'s Marketplace without Big Ticket.
BLM do not plan Confirmed Sales

Confirmed Sales Forecast Amount for Owned and Leased Marketplace - Total Confirmed Sales forecast amount (Owned, Leased and Marketplace) with Big Ticket.Not available for Bloomigdales.
BLM do not forecast  Confirmed Sales

Confirmed Sales Forecast Amount for Owned and Leased - Confirmed Sales forecast amount (Owned & Leased) for <customer>'s with Big Ticket .Plan value excludes Marketplace
BLM do not forecast  Confirmed Sales

Confirmed Sales Forecast Amount for Marketplace - Confirmed sales forecast amount for <customer>'s Marketplace  without Big Ticket.
BLM do not forecast  Confirmed Sales

Demand Cancel Forecast Amount for Owned and Leased Departments - Demand Cancel Forecast Amount for Owned and Leased Departments
Bloomingdales do not forecast Demand at Owned & Leased cancels.

Demand Cancel Forecast Amount for Marketplace Departments - Demand Cancel Forecast Amount for Marketplace Departments
Bloomingdales do not forecast Demand Marketplace cancels.

Demand Cancel Forecast Amount for Owned Leased and Marketplace Departments - Demand Cancel Forecast Amount for Owned Leased and Marketplace Departments
Bloomingdales do not forecast Demand  OLM cancels.

Demand Cancel Plan Amount for Owned and Leased Departments - Demand Cancel Plan Amount for Owned and Leased Departments
Bloomingdales do not plan Demand Owned & Leased cancels.

Demand Cancel Plan Amount for Marketplace Departments - Demand Cancel Plan Amount for Marketplace Departments
Bloomingdales do not plan Demand Marketplace cancels.
